Class ExpenseRecordDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.algonquin.www.dao.impl.ExpenseRecordDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExpenseRecordDAO
public class ExpenseRecordDAOImpl extends Object implements ExpenseRecordDAO
Implementation of ExpenseRecordDAO interface for managing expense records stored in the database.

Provides methods to search, add, and retrieve expense records. Uses DataSource to obtain database connections.

Since:
2025-08-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
